review.reviewBody: excellent portion size for small Lasagna! very filling
The food was fine but not exceptional. The sauce on the carbonara did not seem cheesy enough.

The large portion is actually HUGE so that's a win but it's still very mediocre lasagna.. I think it would taste better if the pasta was al dente rather than overcooked and the sauce had more flavour.
Creole Fettuccine with vegetables and garlic cheese bread was delicious and everything else was awesome definitely returning for delivery from this gem yum-o!
